title: Champion select problems
body: Anyone else having issues with joining champion select? Every time I start a game all I get is a black screen for a few seconds before champion select finally opens, and by then everyone's already called they're lanes and I usually have to ask what my lane is and sometimes I get time bans because I didnt't pick a champion because I didn't know what role I am.

replies.body: Happens to me sometimes. Not very often though.

> [{quoted}](name=tURtL3s,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Qg6lyXEQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-21T09:36:42.072+0000)
>
> Happens to me sometimes. Not very often though.

Happens to me everytime
It's usually just your computer that's causing a slow response, or even your internet connection. If your connection is a bit slow at a certain time, then you'll load in slower than everyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=tURtL3s,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Qg6lyXEQ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-21T23:28:02.776+0000)
>
> It's usually just your computer that's causing a slow response, or even your internet connection. If your connection is a bit slow at a certain time, then you'll load in slower than everyone else.


Not true. I have a pretty damn great PC if i don't say so. And my connection is incredibly stable and i live very close to the servers (5-15ms most times) and not to mention it is a cable connnection. Yet i still get a black screen before champ select. It isn't as long as OP's but at times it can take up to 15-20 seconds long. Where my brother who had a crappy computer compared to mine got in near instantly with no black screen. 

It doens't happen ever in ranked for me though. So i think it might be a blind pick issue or something.
